reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The HP +10 Conference in February 2012 (13.-14.2.2012) celebrates the 10th anniversary of the Helsinki Process and its purpose is to look back on what were the lessons learned from the Process and what has happened to the commitments made at the end of the Process also the purpose is to renew the networks that formed during the Process. The goal of the Conference is to find out whether the legacy and models of the Process could be utilized in solving today's global problems and get views on how the aims in the Government Program on globalisation and sustainable development could be advanced and concretized.
